casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dontail BRINKLEY 394P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 21, 2017 Michele A. Goldman, Attorney at Law, for Brinkley, Dontail. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Robert A. Evans, Jr., District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of November 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of November 2017."
